message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique and valuable product. I believe you'll find it's worth every penny. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1400000. This is the best I can do for now.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1250000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I really need to stay within my budget. Can you consider that?

I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. However, I need to consider my own costs and profit margins. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need $1350000 to make this deal worthwhile. Can you meet me there?
I'm getting close to my budget, but I'm still not comfortable with $1350000. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer $1275000. Can you consider that?
